views.markdown:
iOS 7 support Fixed a conflict where iMessage was sometimes prevented from sending photos. Fixes an issue with corrections on iOS 5.

Fixed period shortcut and casing issues on iOS 6

    v 1.1.2
  • Improved correction auto-casing.
  • Corrections can now be marked as suggestions rather than forced automatically
    v 1.1.1
  • Fixed issues with Japanese and Chinese keyboards
    v 1.1.0
  • Custom corrections can now be case-sensitive.
  • Corrections can be forced in all fields, even passwords.
  • Improved settings and a new correction ignore list.
  • Fixed bug with correction (X) indicator
